001package net.tvburger.jdl.model.nn;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.common.patterns.DomainObject;
004
005/**
006 * Represents an input neuron in a neural network.
007 * <p>
008 * Unlike hidden or output neurons, an {@code InputNeuron} does not
009 * compute its output from weighted inputs and an activation function.
010 * Instead, its output value is set directly from outside the network
011 * (e.g., by feeding in features of a training or inference sample).
012 * </p>
013 *
014 * <h2>Behavior</h2>
015 * <ul>
016 *   <li>{@link #setInputValue(float)} assigns the fixed output value
017 *       for this input neuron and marks it as activated.</li>
018 *   <li>{@link #activate()} does not perform any computation; it merely
019 *       verifies that the neuron has been given an input value, otherwise
020 *       it throws an {@link IllegalStateException}.</li>
021 *   <li>{@link #deactivate()} (inherited) clears the activation flag so
022 *       a new input can be assigned in a subsequent pass.</li>
023 * </ul>
024 *
025 * <h2>Usage example</h2>
026 * <pre>{@code
027 * InputNeuron n1 = new InputNeuron("x1");
028 * InputNeuron n2 = new InputNeuron("x2");
029 *
030 * n1.setInputValue(0.5f);
031 * n2.setInputValue(-1.2f);
032 *
033 * // these are now ready to be consumed by downstream neurons
034 * float v1 = n1.getOutput(); // 0.5
035 * float v2 = n2.getOutput(); // -1.2
036 * }</pre>
037 *
038 * <p>
039 * Input neurons are typically the entry points of a network, one per
040 * feature dimension in the dataset.
041 * </p>
042 */
043@DomainObject
044public class InputNeuron extends Neuron {
045
046    private float input;
047
048    /**
049     * Constructs a new input neuron with the given name.
050     * Input neurons have no inputs or activation function.
051     *
052     * @param name human-readable identifier
053     */
054    public InputNeuron(String name) {
055        super(name, null, null);
056    }
057
058    @Override
059    public float estimateScalar(float[] inputs) {
060        return input;
061    }
062
063    /**
064     * Sets the externally provided input value for this neuron and marks
065     * it as activated.
066     *
067     * @param input the input value to assign
068     */
069    public void setInputValue(float input) {
070        this.input = input;
071        activate();
072    }
073
074    /**
075     * {@inheritDoc}
076     */
077    public float getOutput() {
078        return input;
079    }
080
081}
